TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , was a NORP national born in DATE . He died on DATE . The applicant was represented before the ORG by Mr I. Barbalics , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE . On DATE , following an enquiry , the applicant 's CARDINAL surviving daughters , PERSON and PERSON , informed the ORG that they wished to continue their late father 's case pending before it . They appointed PERSON ORG as their representative .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant filed an action for divorce with ORG . In a second action , he sought the division of the matrimonial property . The CARDINAL actions were later joined by the court .

On DATE ORG held a hearing and invited the applicant to submit a precise statement of claim . On DATE the applicant extended the scope of his action in order to associate all the owners of the real estate with the proceedings .

On DATE the court imposed a fine on the applicant 's lawyer on the ground that it was impossible for the court to rule on the submissions which he had made . In an order of CARDINAL DATE the court separated the divorce proceedings from the proceedings on the division of the matrimonial property . On DATE the applicant informed the court that he had discontinued his legal representative 's power of attorney and requested the court to assign a new legal representative to him .
On DATE ORG pronounced the parties ' divorce .

On DATE ORG held a hearing in the proceedings on the division of the matrimonial property and appointed a legal counsel to represent the applicant in the case . At the applicant 's request , on DATE the court withdrew this appointment .
On DATE the court heard the parties and requested them to submit their evidence within DATE .
At a hearing on DATE the court appointed an expert and instructed him to submit his opinion within DATE . The next hearing was held on DATE .
The expert submitted his opinion on DATE .
In the meantime one of the defendants died . On DATE ORG suspended the proceedings pending the participation of the deceased 's successors in the proceedings .
On DATE the court held a hearing .
On DATE the court ruled on the division of the matrimonial property .
On the applicant 's appeal , on DATE ORG quashed this judgment and remitted the case to ORG . It held that ORG had committed several procedural errors .

In the resumed proceedings before ORG , the applicant chose to be represented by PERSON The court held hearings on DATE and on DATE , DATE , CARDINAL May and DATE . At the last hearing ORG appointed an expert . He submitted his opinion on DATE .
In a judgment of DATE the court divided the parties ' matrimonial property .
On DATE the ORG confirmed the first instance judgment .
On DATE the applicant filed with ORG a petition for review of the judgment by ORG .
After the petition had been transferred to it by ORG , ORG ordered on DATE that the petition be filed by a legal representative in accordance with domestic legal requirements .

On DATE the applicant requested legal aid . In an order of CARDINAL DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's request as his financial situation did not justify the grant of legal aid . Pursuant to the relevant legislation , ORG on the same date requested the applicant to appoint , within DATE , a lawyer to represent him in the proceedings . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's petition for review , observing that the applicant had failed to appoint a legal representative . The decision was served on the applicant on DATE .

In DATE the applicant brought an official liability action before ORG . He claimed compensation from ORG , which had dealt with the divorce case . He maintained that his case had not been dealt with properly in that the court had failed to uncover that his representative , PERSON , was an impostor . After several hearings , on DATE ORG discontinued the proceedings as the applicant had withdrawn his action .
